department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Portable Radio Frequency (RF)/Electro-magnetic Interference (EMI) Shielded Enclosures (PRESE)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. Bidder is to fulfill the requirement in accordance with Annex A – Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
**Title:** Portable Radio Frequency (RF)/Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Shielded Enclosures (PRESE)
**Notice Types:** Request for Proposal
**Reference Number:** WS4350964408
**Publication Date:** December 20, 2023
**Closing Date:** January 18, 2024, 14:00 EST

**Amendment Information**
The closing time for bid submission has been modified. Bidders must submit their bids on January 18, 2024, by 14:00 EST to be considered responsive. Late bids will not be accepted.

**Requirements**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to purchase two (2) Portable Radio Frequency (RF)/Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Shielded Enclosures (PRESE) with an option to purchase up to one (1) additional unit within 18 months of contract award.

**UNSPAC Codes**
This procurement is categorized under the following UNSPAC codes:
* 41103500: Laboratory enclosures and accessories
* 49121503: Tents
* 95131700: Tents and membrane structures

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is open to contractors participating in the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Contracting Entity Information**
The contracting entity for this procurement is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Contact Information**
For more information about this procurement, contact Mike Littlefield at mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Attachments**
There are no attachments to this notice.

**Notice URL**
The notice can be accessed online at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18332413?extsite=MTgzMzI0MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
